name: Death To The Cats
description:
Game Made entirely by two programmers for the GC GameJam 4: 

~>Creators: Saiony (Cauê Chaves) and VAuron (Victor Santos) <~

The game is a survival + Tower defense that you have to slay beautiful cats in the jungle and gather their loot. On the night the evil and demonic cats try to destroy your home, so you need to build towers to protect yourself. 

Controls for the Day: 

->Left Mouse Button - Melee Attack

->Right Mouse Button - Shoots Fireball

Controls for the Night:

->Left Mouse Button - Appear Tower on Cursor
->Left Mouse Button Again - Place Tower
